alert.note: Alert for Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:26PM EDT until May 30 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL LEE COUNTY... At 424 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Southwest Florida Airport, or near Lehigh Acres, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 409 PM EDT, Southwest Florida International Airport (KRSW) ASOS reported a 55kt (63 MPH) wind gust. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Myers, Southwest Florida Airport, Lehigh Acres, Gateway, Buckingham, East Dunbar and Tice. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
